Predict Anything
in the Universe

A rigorous mathematical prediction system based on the universal argmax equation. From markets to weather, sensors to health‚Äîif it has sequential data, ORXL can predict it.

The universal prediction equation

Possibilities
prediction.py
from src.data_ingestion.providers import UniversalFileProvider

# Predict weather
weather = UniversalFileProvider('data/weather', 
                                   schema_mode='flexible')
forecast = weather.fetch_current_price('NYC')

# Predict sensor failures
sensors = UniversalFileProvider('data/sensors',
                                   schema_mode='minimal')
reading = sensors.fetch_current_price('factory_01')

# Predict health events
health = UniversalFileProvider('data/health')
vitals = health.fetch_current_price('patient_123')

Why ORXL?

Built on rigorous mathematical foundations with no ML frameworks‚Äîpure numpy/scipy

üéØ

Universal

One equation predicts everything: markets, weather, sensors, health, text, systems

Learn more ‚Üí
üî¨

Rigorous

Based on Bayesian decision theory, PAC learning, and information theory

Modular

Get Started in 60 Seconds

1

Install

pip install -r requirements.txt
2

Add Data

cp templates/weather.csv data/
3

Predict

python predict.py --data weather
